aors.module.physics.collision
Class IntervalList2DGrid

java.lang.Object
  aors.module.physics.collision.IntervalList2DGrid

public class IntervalList2DGrid
extends java.lang.Object

An IntervalList used for 2D collision detection in grid space.

Constructor Summary
IntervalList2DGrid(java.util.List<Physical> objList, GeneralSpaceModel spaceModel)
          Creates a new IntervalList for 2D grid space.
 
Method Summary
 void add(Physical object)
          Add an object to this list.
 void detectPerceptions(java.util.Set<Perception2DGrid> perceptionList)
          Checks if any perceptions occur.
 void remove(Physical object)
          Removes an object from the list.
 void update()
          Updates the list with the values of the objects saved in the interval endpoints.

Method Detail

add

public void add(Physical object)
Add an object to this list. This will add two endpoints for the object and in case of an agent two endpoints for its perception radius to both coordinate lists.

Parameters:
object -

update

public void update()
Updates the list with the values of the objects saved in the interval endpoints.

remove

public void remove(Physical object)
Removes an object from the list.

Parameters:
object -

detectPerceptions

public void detectPerceptions(java.util.Set<Perception2DGrid> perceptionList)
Checks if any perceptions occur. The "sort-and-sweep" algorithm is used here to determine overlapping intervals.

Parameters:
perceptionList - - list where all detected perceptions are saved
